rows.label: qst701107_msg0001
rows.name:
Look. Thanks to you all,
it's finally complete.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0002
rows.name: Th-The ship is really finished...!!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0003
rows.name:
Hahahaha, of course it is. We
were building a ship, after all.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0004
rows.name:
I rushed to finish it, so
there are still plenty of
places I'd like to work on.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0005
rows.name:
Heh, it's more impressive
than I thought.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0006
rows.name: Ah, it's Maquia-san.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0007
rows.name:
Let me introduce you.
This is the helmsman...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0008
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Aaaaaah!? The helmsman is you!?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0009
rows.name: Yo, rookie♪ You look as poor as ever.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0010
rows.name: You know each other?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0011
rows.name:
Know each other is an understatement. She was a
freeloader at the master's house for a while.
Since then, we've had this rotten connection...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0012
rows.name:
...Well, anyway, she's a master
carrier! She'll deliver anything
perfectly, but she demands a high price.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0013
rows.name:
Don't talk about me like I'm a money-grubber.
I follow the master's instructions and
choose my clients carefully.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0014
rows.name:
So, what do you want to
transport? Weapons? Money?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0015
rows.name:
Monsters are a bit of
a pain, so no thanks.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0016
rows.name: Idiot, it's people!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0017
rows.name:
There's going to be another battle here soon. When
that happens, I want to take as many people from
the town as possible and be ready to escape.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0018
rows.name:
Of course, one ship like this isn't enough.
I plan to keep preparing, to have as many
as possible, as soon as possible.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0019
rows.name:
Hmm, so you're planning an
escape. You're abandoning Iira?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0020
rows.name:
No! As long as the people
of Iira live, the land where
they live becomes Iira.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0021
rows.name:
Ahaha, so what? You want
me to transport a country?
You really are a rookie.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0022
rows.name:
...But that's so like you. I
guess I'll lend you a hand♪

rows.label: qst701107_msg0023
rows.name:
Well then, let me take a
look at a few things.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0024
rows.name:
I see... So, Wotta-san was building
this ship to save everyone.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0025
rows.name:
I haven't thought about it
that deeply. I just started
with what I could do.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0026
rows.name:
Normally, there are limits to what a
country's leadership can do. I thought it
wouldn't be good to just wait to be saved.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0027
rows.name:
...Still, it's amazing that you
could think so straightforwardly.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0028
rows.name:
Hahahaha, thank you. In any case, the trick
in times like these is not to try to do
everything perfectly from the start.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0029
rows.name: Because you'll lose motivation!!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0030
rows.name:
I can't tell if you're
motivated or not.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0031
rows.name:
But if you keep at it, you'll finish
it before you know it. If it's
something you really want to do.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0032
rows.name: Something I really want to do, huh...

rows.label: qst701107_msg0033
rows.name:
Wow, amazing. A new
ship is really here.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0034
rows.name: I'm glad we came, right Sata?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0036
rows.name:
You're staring so intently.
Do you like ships?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0037
rows.name:
I see... No matter what, it's
important to have something
you can be passionate about.

rows.label: qst701107_msg0038
rows.name:
But for now, we continue
our shopping! Let's go!

rows.label: qst701107_msg0039
rows.name:
Come on. If Hikari finds out we're
slacking, she'll be a pain, right?

rows.label: qst701107_msg0040
rows.name: We'll come back together! Okay?
